description: This Dart source file defines various provider classes for managing application state in a Flutter app. It includes authentication, game listing, leaderboard, and user settings providers, utilizing ChangeNotifier for state updates and SharedPreferences for persistent local storage. It also includes utility methods for initializing state and communicating with an API client.

classes.name: _LoadableState
classes.description: A base class with loading and error state management, using ChangeNotifier.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: Manages authentication state, including token persistence and session restoration.

classes.name: GameItem
classes.description: Represents a game with id and title, created from JSON data.

classes.name: GamesProvider
classes.description: Handles fetching and providing a list of games, with fallback mock data.

classes.name: LeaderboardEntry
classes.description: Encapsulates a leaderboard entry with rank, player, and points, created from JSON.

classes.name: LeaderboardProvider
classes.description: Handles fetching and providing leaderboard entries, with fallback mock data.

classes.name: SettingsProvider
classes.description: Manages user settings, including notifications, contrast, language, and font scale, with persistence.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the provider state by loading data from SharedPreferences or restoring session.

methods.name: signInWithToken
methods.description: Signs in the user with a token, saving it persistently.

methods.name: signOut
methods.description: Signs out the user, clearing token and resetting state.

methods.name: fetchGames
methods.description: Fetches the list of games from the API or uses mock data on failure.

methods.name: fetchLeaderboard
methods.description: Fetches leaderboard data from the API or uses mock data on failure.

methods.name: setNotifications
methods.description: Updates notification preference and saves persistently.

methods.name: setHighContrast
methods.description: Updates high contrast setting and saves persistently.

methods.name: setLanguageCode
methods.description: Updates language preference and saves persistently.

methods.name: setFontScale
methods.description: Updates font scale setting and saves persistently.
